title: LF adc main silver/gold duo
body:
Looking for an adc main to duo with, I am a gold support main in silver promos currently... I can play most supports but just mainly playing  {{champion:516}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:223}} 

add me if interested.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=DonutDenis,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=VL1PgKti,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-05-07T12:50:34.534+0000)
>
> Hey, ADC main, add me and we can play :D !!! <3

added
